heading: HR01247
0: A RESOLUTION DECLARING FEBRUARY 2 OF EVERY YEAR AS A SPECIAL NONWORKING HOLIDAY IN THE PROVINCE OF ILOCOS SUR AND SHALL BE KNOWN AS ILOCOS SUR DAY ("KANNAWIDAN ILOCOS FESTIVAL")
status: Pending with the Committee on REVISION OF LAWS since 2017-09-04
